view

Class DisplayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.DisplayManager

  • public class DisplayManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Display management class used to handle the resolution and FPS of the game.

    Arguably this class could be in the model, however it fits nicely here and the resolution and fps values are static for the time being

    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean VSYNC_ENABLED
      Whether the Display should use VSync to smooth out vertical tearing
